title.narrative: PROCOFSERVICES and P0038 for State Initiatives Fund

description.narrative: This activity (PROCOFSERVICES and P0038 for State Initiatives Fund) is a component of Enugu: State Initiatives Fund reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £2,076,654. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Promotion of development awareness (non-sector allocable). The start date is 01-08-2001 and the end date is 31-12-2013.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
